## Tools & Stack

- Real-time WebSocket ingestion (IBKR/Alpaca)  
- PostgreSQL + Parquet storage (AWS S3)  
- XGBoost + Isolation Forest + Rule-based hybrid  
- Docker deployment, Railway, AWS EC2, + Grafana Dashboard
